name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel DELKER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
NIX, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel DELKER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
NIX, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John H. Corbett, Jr., David Metinko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Charles W. Johns, Kathryn L. Simpson, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
412 A.2d 881
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Daniel DELKER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 7, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
John H. Corbett, Jr., David Metinko, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Charles W. Johns, Kathryn L. Simpson, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
